Ok I downed it, even burned it, but when I put this in my xbox it says Play DVD, I was like hmkay maybe with trying the wave 4 disc first..
So first I booted the wave 4 disc, took it out, putted this one in, ok it says Play Game, ok I pressed A and then it won't boot and get back to the starting screen, there it shows "This disc is unreadable. 1. Clean the disc with a soft cloth 2. restart the console.

For more help, visit www.xbox.com/support.

....
This isn't the only game that get's like this...
What to do to solve this problem?

the problem is ether the magnet on top on you dvd xbox driver..

og you might even have a rrd.

but probly you need a new driver..

To fix this problem you need to load the DVD file when burning, not the iso file. So if you're using imgburn, click the .dvd file.
If this download doesnt have one, then just make on and re-name it. 
I used to get the same problem and constantly re-downloaded torrents, until I saw a pattern....
